feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts

entry.title: The Syrian government has falled
entry.content:
Post 206624 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: We probably need a post with more info, background and resources so people can learn / understand more. Thanks! -- taz

entry.title: It’s done
entry.content:

entry.title: “Death Is What Gives Life Meaning”
entry.content:
Post 206440 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but this conflicts with some criteria for Best Practices and Recommendations for Reporting on Suicide, which we try to abide by. No problem to do an edit and re-up for this. -- taz

entry.title: Mrs. French’s cat is missing
